projects.title: Audiophle E-commerce
projects.description: This full-stack e-commerce application, built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), features user authentication with JWT and secure token management. It includes a dynamic product management system with data seeded from a JSON file, a custom checkout process, and HTTP-only cookies for enhanced security against CSRF attacks. This project highlights my skills in full-stack development and implementing advanced security features.

projects.title: Sport club
projects.description: This project, part of my full-stack developer diploma, is a comprehensive Sports Club Management System. It empowers club administrators to efficiently manage activities and plans with CRUD operations. Additionally, members can update their profiles easily.
